  • It turns out my error was because of something dumb I did. Trying to add constraints to a UILayoutGuide before adding it to the my view first. So the error happened when making the first constraint.

  • TIL a lot about he footerView property on UITableView. It doesn’t play well with auto layout, and isn’t a self sizing view. So putting a UIStackView containing 1 or 2 UIButtons just wasn’t working for me.

    → 8:26 PM, May 9

  • Pro tip: When adding an NSTextView programatically, add it to an NSScrollView’s documentView property.
